summary: This document contains investigative notes regarding Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein, detailing allegations of hiring young women for questionable activities at Epstein's residence. It includes intelligence reports, interviews with individuals who interacted with Maxwell and Epstein, and findings from trash pulls that revealed concerning materials related to their activities.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Maxwell is reported to have hired young women from Palm Beach Atlantic College to work at her residence, allegedly for inappropriate purposes.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is associated with Ghislaine Maxwell and is alleged to have engaged in inappropriate behavior with young women at his residence.

persons.name: Sgt. Frick
persons.context: Sgt. Frick is involved in the investigation and has provided intelligence regarding Maxwell and Epstein's activities.

persons.name: Det. Taylor
persons.context: Det. Taylor is involved in the investigation and has documented findings related to Maxwell and Epstein.

persons.name: Kim Ladd
persons.context: Kim Ladd accompanied officers during a room search and provided information about the activities at Epstein's residence.

persons.name: Winkler
persons.context: Winkler confirmed being approached by Maxwell and briefly working at the residence, noting the unusual atmosphere.

persons.name: Goad
persons.context: Goad also confirmed being approached by Maxwell and working at the residence, sharing observations about the environment.

connections.description: Maxwell and Epstein are alleged to have collaborated in recruiting young women for questionable activities at Epstein's residence.
Winkler was approached by Maxwell to work at her residence, indicating a direct employer-employee relationship.
Goad was also approached by Maxwell to work at her residence, indicating a similar employer-employee relationship.
Sgt. Frick and Det. Taylor are both involved in the investigation of Maxwell and Epstein.

events.title: Intelligence Received
events.description: Intelligence was received regarding Maxwell hiring young women from PBAC to work at her residence.

events.title: Information Passed
events.description: Information regarding Maxwell and Epstein was passed on from Sgt. Frick to Det. Taylor.

events.title: Trash Pulls Initiated
events.description: Trash pulls were initiated as part of the investigation, revealing various intelligence items.

events.title: Investigative Subpoena Completed
events.description: An investigative subpoena was completed requesting all incoming and outgoing lines to Epstein's residence.

events.title: Interviews Conducted
events.description: Interviews were conducted with individuals who had worked at Epstein's residence, confirming unusual activities.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL
keyFacts: Maxwell allegedly hired young women from Palm Beach Atlantic College to work at her residence for $200 per day.
Witnesses reported inappropriate touching by Epstein and a secretive atmosphere at the residence.
Trash pulls revealed concerning materials, including lists of female names and references to massages.
Investigative subpoenas were issued to gather phone records related to Epstein's residence.
Witnesses described nude photographs and topless women at Epstein's residence, contributing to the investigation.
